description:
Misaki moves to Tokyo to live with her aunt. After getting lost at the train station she sees an Angelic Fight on a big screen. A mysterious man, Icchan, who followed her out of the train station tells her more about `Angelic Layer` and helps her to create her own angel, Hikaru.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Enchantée ! C`est mon ange à moi.
Hallo wie gehts? Mein eigener Angel!
How Do You Do? My Very Own Angel
Prazer Em Conhecê-la! Seja Meu Único Angel!
はじめまして! 私だけのエンジェル
